title: Serious Sam:The Complete Story (MOD)
description:
1.What's SSTCS?
SSTCS (Serious Sam:The Complete Story) is a free modification which comes with the following things:
-FE and SE connection (this means you'll start from Hatshepsut)
-Xbox Models (contains all the xbox models for Beheadeads,Ugh-Zan,Serious Sam,Weapons,Croteam Bigheads.)
-New music from xbox version of ss1 for a couple of levels (Luxor,Sierra de Chiapas,Valley Of Jaguar,The City of the Gods,Ziggurrat,Courtyards Of Gilgamesh,Tower of Babylon,The Citadel,The Grand Cathedral.)
-Multiplayer patch,you can this mod online.
-Serious Editor has been added.

2.What's the point of this mod?
Well,this mods aims to be more like xbox version of ss1.

3.Bugs and problems
The only bugs i knew are the following
1.FE key items were replaced with SE ones. FIXED
2.After picking up the gold ank in Karnak under the sleeping scorpion then finishing fighting in that room the door you need exit wouldn't open (some missing files from FE,now it should work). FIXED
3.FE Levels spawns were messed up before,now i edited them and the levels work fine.

4.Changes in levels
Well not much to say here.
1.Hatsheptsut - changed the non-secret colt with the chainsaw like in the xbox version.
2.Sierra de Chiapas - when you start this level after finishing The Great Pyramid level,you were able to keep all the weapons and ammo,now you'll start only with a colt and the knife.
3.Desert Temple (DM)-replaced 2 of the existent weapons in the level with chainsaw and the laser gun.If it's not ok let me know

If you find a bug or you want to see something new in the mod contact me.

Ways of contacting me:
Steam:Rogan
skype:alexandru.matei51
Or contact me on http://42amsterdam.net/ i'm pretty much active there also check the forum regulary for this mod updates
